title: Ticket #4429: Missing checkpoint servers cause much badput
description: When the checkpoint server is unreachable, jobs standard universe jobs are still launched and slots are still claimed for 5 minutes before the starter gives up restarting the job. Then the job is rescheduled, and the cycle repeats. This can create a lot of badput.
remarks:
2018-Mar-01 14:32:09 by tlmiller:
Standard universe has been in maintenance-only mode for some time, abandoning.
